objects.label: rooftop_figure
objects.notes: Figure prone on rooftop of office building 3 blocks ahead of motorcade. Long object beside them.

objects.label: unauthorized_vehicle
objects.notes: White box truck parked in motorcade lane 4 blocks ahead. Not on cleared vehicle list. Has been stationary 45 minutes.

objects.label: crowd_cluster
objects.notes: ~200 spectators gathered on pedestrian overpass above motorcade route. Some leaning over railing.

objects.label: suspicious_package
objects.notes: Cardboard box on median strip along motorcade route. No owner. Placed within last hour per prior sweep comparison.

objects.label: suspicious_person
objects.notes: Individual in dark clothing standing in alley mouth 5 blocks ahead. Has repositioned twice as motorcade approaches.

objects.label: perimeter_breach
objects.notes: Person jumped road barrier into motorcade lane 2 blocks ahead. Running toward route centerline.

objects.label: unauthorized_drone
objects.notes: Small object hovering at ~120ft over buildings east of route. Possibly commercial drone or bird.

objects.label: protest_group
objects.notes: Group of ~50 protesters at intersection 6 blocks ahead. Blocking crosswalk. Police liaison present.

objects.label: approaching_vehicle
objects.notes: Sedan driving wrong-way on closed motorcade route. Approaching from 3 blocks ahead. Speed ~25mph.

instruction.text: Senator motorcade en route through downtown corridor. Critical priority: rooftop threats, vehicles in the route, and perimeter breaches. Immediately flag anyone or anything in the motorcade lane. Watch for suspicious packages and unauthorized drones. Monitor protest groups for movement toward the route.
